page.title: 03River Wylye Pests
page.content: There are many kinds of pest on the river wylye.One of them is the swan because it eats the new shoots of weed just after winter which is drastic for the fish because they use it for shelter from the sun. Pike are another pest.They are known to eat eight times ther own weight.The biggest pike caught in the river weighed twenty five pounds.The river hadn't been cleared of pike for eight years.When it was done this year eighty six pike were removed and three hundred eels.It was done with two electric wires which stun the fish for a short time. Mink are another nuisance.The mink is a deadly killer.They not only eat the fish but they attack the birds on the river banks.They probably escape from mink farms . The only human nuisance is poachers.
